CategoricalDataClassificationAnalysis 0.1
  • Reference

    Categorical Data Classification Analysis

    CategoricalDataClassificationAnalysis.Rd

    It performs the Categorical Data Classification Analysis from a data.frame of categorical data

    CategoricalDataClassificationAnalysis(db, n_model, coordinates = "two")

    Arguments

    db

    Database predictor and response variables. It must contain either character data or factors. The last column must contain the response variable

    n_model

    Number of individuals to build the map. The number of individuals in the test set is calculated by difference.

    coordinates

    Coordinates used in the discrimination. By default, the two polar coordinates will be used. If you only want to do it for one, you must indicate the name of the coordinate (theta or rho).

    Value

    List of calculated predictive parameters (relative confussion matrix, negative and positive predictive values, F1 score, Cohen's kappa and Matthew's correlation coefficients)

    Contents

    Developed by Raquel Bosch-Romeu.
